import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./CallToAction.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CallToAction=()=>{const[isMobile,setIsMobile]=useState(false);// Check if the viewport is mobile
useEffect(()=>{const checkMobile=()=>{setIsMobile(window.innerWidth<=768);};// Initial check
checkMobile();// Add event listener for window resize
window.addEventListener('resize',checkMobile);// Cleanup
return()=>window.removeEventListener('resize',checkMobile);},[]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData(e.target);const name=formData.get('name');const email=formData.get('email');const phone=formData.get('phone');const service=formData.get('service');if(isMobile){// On mobile, send a text message
const message=`Hi, I'm ${name} and I'm interested in a free consultation for ${service} training.`;window.location.href=`sms:7868040689?body=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`;}else{// On desktop, send an email
const subject=`Consultation Request from ${name}`;const body=`Name: ${name}%0D%0AEmail: ${email}%0D%0APhone: ${phone}%0D%0AService: ${service}%0D%0A`;window.location.href=`mailto:trainseniorsonline@gmail.com?subject=${subject}&body=${body}`;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"join",className:"cta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cta-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"READY TO GET STARTED?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Take the first step toward your fitness goals today."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"cta-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Your Name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Your Email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",name:"phone",placeholder:"Your Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"service",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",disabled:true,selected:true,children:"Select Service"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"personal",children:"Personal Training"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"online",children:"Online Coaching"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"group",children:"Group Sessions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"nutrition",children:"Nutrition Planning"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:isMobile?"Text For Free Consultation":"Get Your Free Consultation"})]})]})})});};export default CallToAction;
